invalidMention: You need to mention a valid user, to execute the command.

minecraft.invalidPlayer: Please enter a valid nickname or uuid.

language.messageSuccess: Now I will speak English with you!
language.messageError: I'm already speaking English with you.

help.embedDescription: If you want to see information about a command use **{{prefix}}Help [commandName]**.

prefix.limit: The prefix limit is at least 5 letters.
prefix.same: You cannot change the prefix to the same one that is already there.
prefix.success: Now my new prefix on that server is {{prefix}}

emoji.invalid: I didn't find this emoji anywhere on this server.
